algorithms.paths

Class Path_BatchHeap

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithms.paths.DP_Anyk_Iterator
      • algorithms.paths.Path_Batch
        • algorithms.paths.Path_BatchHeap

  • public class Path_BatchHeap
extends Path_Batch
    This algorithm produces all the solutions to a DP problem specified as a DP_Problem_Instance object and then puts them into a PQ (heap) so that it can return them in ranked order. The class has been customized for join problems only since it produces Path_Query_Solution as results. It is implemented as an iterator that is first initialized and then the method get_next() returns the next best solution. The batch-computation of all the solutions is done via the methods of Path_Batch that are inherited.

    IMPORTANT: Before using this class, the nodes and the edges of the DP state-space graph must have already been initialized either by DP_Problem_Instance.bottom_up() or some other method.
    Author:
    Nikolaos Tziavelis
